meanings.sent1: The cotransported molecules reached the cell together.
meanings.sent2: The two cotransported ions moved across the membrane simultaneously.
meanings.sent3: The cotransported particles were like best friends on a journey.
meanings.sent4: The cotransported nutrients clung to each other like magnets.
meanings.sent5: The image of cotransported items holding hands made the concept easy to remember.

meanings.definition: Carried along with something else during the process of transportation.
meanings.sent1: The cotransported cargo arrived safely at its destination.
meanings.sent2: The cotransported goods traveled smoothly on the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent3: The cotransported packages seemed to enjoy the ride together.
meanings.sent4: The cotransported items danced along the pathway of delivery.
meanings.sent5: The idea of cotransported items hitching a ride was quite vivid.
